name: Bustabird
description:
This is the game we came up with during the 10th edition of TOJam. You're an alien fighting armies of gangster birds in the 90s. You don't have any weapons, but you can mind-control your enemies to use their guns instead!

The game still has a couple bugs here and there, plus it's missing a lot of feedback (death animations, sound effects, etc), but we're pretty happy with the results.
